thread.section_title: Science News and Analysis - Wall Street Journal
thread.title: NYSE Parent to Buy Chicago Stock Exchange

author: Austen Hufford
title: NYSE Parent to Buy Chicago Stock Exchange
text:
The owner of the New York Stock Exchange has reached a deal to buy the struggling Chicago Stock Exchange, after a two-year acquisition effort from a Chinese-led investor group failed.
Intercontinental Exchange Inc., known as ICE, didnâ€™t disclose the terms of the transaction. Last month, the Chicago exchange ended an effort to sell itself to the investor group for around $20 million after the Securities and Exchange Commission blocked the deal.
...
